channel.title: CVE Feed for miguelo2008 -- ToolBar to Share
channel.description: The latest CVEs for miguelo2008 -- ToolBar to Share

item.title: CVE-2022-1918|2024-08-03T00:17:00.908Z -- miguelo2008 -- toolbar%20to%20share
item.description: The ToolBar to Share plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 2.0. This is due to missing nonce validation on the plugin_toolbar_comparte page. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update the plugins settings and inject malicious web scripts via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
